backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing rooms, devices, sensors, user profiles and support tickets with admin/user authorization and CRUD/query operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product requirements to related frontend files, components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining light/dark OKLCH variables and base component styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point enabling dark mode by default and loading the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling security gating, navigation state and 3D view transitions.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/LiveSt: Dashboard widget section computing and rendering energy, health and device activity charts with loading states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/widget: Generates a pie chart with SVG paths, percentages, and legend, handling empty data states.
Builds a 24h energy usage line chart with computed SVG path, gradient area fill, and point markers.
Renders a circular health gauge with color-coded progress and status text based on a 0–100 value.
frontend/src/components/effects/GlassCar: Displays a card with a glass effect and optional tilt animation wrapper.
frontend/src/components/effects/Tilt.tsx: Adds interactive 3D tilt animation to children unless reduced motion is preferred.
Provides the main app layout with sidebar, header, and scrollable content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Renders the app's branded header with gradient text styling.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Sideb: Creates sidebar navigation with active states, a quick action button, and integration with custom actions.
frontend/src/components/rooms/CreateDevi: Dialog form to create a new device with validation, ID generation, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/rooms/CreateRoom: Provides a dialog UI for creating rooms with name/color validation and enforcing a 100-room limit before submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomDashbo: Displays detailed controls and status for a room’s devices, including toggling, brightness, master switch, and sensor stats.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomDevice: Shows a room overview card with device list, settings access, and actions to open the room or add devices.
frontend/src/components/rooms/RoomSettin: Dialog for editing a room’s name, color, and visibility with validation and update mutations.
frontend/src/components/security/QRScann: Provides a QR scanning modal using camera access, auto-start logic, error handling, and callback on successful scan.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Bas: Wrapper component that renders the RealisticHomeModel as the 3D interior.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/con: Fullscreen touch-drag region enabling camera rotation on mobile while avoiding the joystick area.
Hook providing pointer‑lock mouse‑look rotation with clamped pitch and cleanup on disable.
Touch‑drag based camera rotation hook for mobile with clamped pitch and active‑touch tracking.
Tracks WASD key state for movement and disables cleanly when not enabled.
Implements an on‑screen joystick with deadzone smoothing for touch and mouse, emitting normalized movement vectors and resetting when disabled.
Combines WASD, mouse look, joystick, and touch look to move the camera with teleportation and room‑based navigation bounds.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/dev: Defines 3D positions for devices and helpers to look them up or filter devices with mapped locations.
Modal dialog for toggling a light device and adjusting brightness via backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/hot: 3D floating clickable orb with hover effects and emissive glow for selecting a device.
Renders hotspots above mapped devices and triggers device selection when clicked.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/lig: Shows light fixture meshes at device positions with emissive brightness based on device state.
Defines ambient, directional, and point lights for the 3D scene and adds device-based lights with intensity based on device state.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/map: Provides static 2D room region geometry and zoom transforms for floorplan interactions.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Rea: Defines a detailed 3D home interior using Three.js meshes, including floors, walls, furniture, and decorative elements.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/roo: Defines per-room camera movement limits used after room teleportation.
Specifies teleport spawn positions and yaw rotations for each room.
Maps click events to room IDs based on camera position, defaulting to room 1 when undetermined.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Roo: Modal dialog listing rooms and allowing users to select one for 3D teleportation.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Sma: Sidebar showing device counts in a room with master ON/OFF controls via a toggle-all mutation.
frontend/src/components/virtual-home/Vir: Renders a stylized 2D floorplan with clickable room regions, zoom transitions, and selection handling.
Error boundary that catches 3D scene rendering errors and reports them to a parent handler.
UI control for switching between 2D map view and 3D walkthrough modes.
Main 3D scene setup with lighting, interior, device layers, navigation, and teleport handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomSidebarActio: Stores and updates a customizable sidebar action in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and identity loading via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects the user's prefers-reduced-motion setting and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend queries and mutations for profiles, rooms, and devices using the actor and react-query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSecurityGateway.ts: Manages secret-key validation, unlock state, and secure storage for a gated access feature.
frontend/src/hooks/useWebGLSupport.ts: Checks browser WebGL support and returns status with any initialization errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables for light/dark modes, and custom utility classes like glass surfaces and map styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a cn helper that merges conditional class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders smart‑home dashboard stats using rooms and device data, with cards and a 3D exploration button.
frontend/src/pages/RoomsPage.tsx: Displays rooms, grouping devices by room and supporting room dashboards, sidebars, and hidden room toggling.
frontend/src/pages/SecurityGatewayPage.t: Handles secret‑key based unlocking with validation, input controls, scanner dialog, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides settings for appearance, custom sidebar actions, and secret‑key visibility/copying.
frontend/src/pages/SupportInfoPage.tsx: Page providing a searchable knowledge base and a support ticket form with validation and submission logic.
frontend/src/pages/VirtualHome3DPage.tsx: Full‑screen 2D/3D virtual home viewer that manages WebGL readiness, room selection, device fetching, and interactive 3D scene controls.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session‑based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state descriptor outlining Phase 3 goals, existing features, new feature requests, and current architectural notes.
